#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Choose
#Text=Artwork for Your Bedroom
#Text=Have you been wanting new artwork for your walls ?
#Text=Do you ever get tired of staring at the same old posters and pictures of things that you do n't like anymore ?
#Text=If you are , then keep reading this article to find out how you can choose great artwork for your bedroom that you 'll want to keep around for a while .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Choosing the Artwork
#Text=Choose artwork with cool colors .
#Text=Two examples of cool colors are blue and green .
#Text=Warm colors such as red , yellow and orange should be saved for rooms where you want a more inviting atmosphere , such as your living room .
#Text=Make sure the artwork is simple .
#Text=Pictures of flowers and other landscapes are good choices .
#Text=Your bedroom should be calm and peaceful , and you 're most likely going to look at this artwork while you 're going to sleep .
#Text=Consider your values .
#Text=For example , some people would rather not have a gory piece of artwork in their room , and some would .
#Text=What you choose is really dependent on what you think is best for your room .
#Text=Artwork can be a very personal thing , so buy something that makes you feel peaceful and relaxed , and that you like .
#Text=Consider the atmosphere , size and lighting in your room .
#Text=For example , if your room is very dark , then you may or may not want artwork that is very dark colored in your room .
#Text=Take note of the colors of certain things in your room , such as your bedspread and carpet .
#Text=Once you take note of this , try and find artwork that contrasts with the colors of the things that are in your room .
#Text=Decide which medium you prefer .
#Text=When most people think of artwork , they think of pictures , posters and paintings .
#Text=However , things like mini sculptures , and even curtains could be good artwork examples too .
#Text=Considering Other Things in Your Room
#Text=Sometimes , you may not think about it , but other things in your room can be considered artwork as well .
#Text=Clean your bedroom
#Text=.
#Text=A clean room can also help evoke a peaceful , relaxing mood , and although you may not think about it , if it is clean enough , it can be considered artwork itself .
#Text=Consider adding a few accents .
#Text=Accents can help with the mood in a bedroom as well , choose items such as a vase , as well as a plant to go inside it .
#Text=As with the artwork , avoid getting the vase in a bright color , as your bedroom is a place for you to sleep in .
#Text=Have a style in your room for the furniture .
#Text=Whether it is shabby chic , or modern , your room is where you can be you .
#Text=So , choose a style for your room that reflects who you are .
#Text=Consider repainting your bedroom walls .
#Text=As with the artwork , try to repaint your walls a cool color that you really like .
#Text=If you go to the store , there are often a ton of choices , so you wo n't be too limited when deciding .
#Text=Have a floor that contrasts with the rest of your room .
#Text=Usually , although it may stain , plain white is a good option , but pick a color that you like and that contrasts with the rest of your room .
#Text=Tips
#Text=You could always make your own work if you 'd like .
#Text=This can sometimes be a cheaper option , as some art supplies can be found at craft and department stores for very low prices .
#Text=Also , you will have total control over what goes on the canvas .
#Text=If you 'd rather not paint your walls yourself , although you will most likely have to pay them , you can hire a professional painter that will do your walls for you .
#Text=Try not to have a carpet that matches your wall colors , as this may not look nice .
#Text=For example , if your walls are a dark green color , then try not to have a dark green colored carpet .
#Text=If you have a lower headboard , consider securely hanging your artwork above your bed .
#Text=This way , especially if the artwork is peaceful , you will see the artwork as you are going to get into your bed to go to sleep .
#Text=If you are concerned about what people may think , remember that a lot of people wo n't see it .
#Text=While almost everyone who comes over to your house will see the bathroom , a very little amount of people will see your room .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Try to buy artwork that you 'll want to have for a while .
#Text=Sometimes , artwork can be very hard to get down once it is hung up , so keep this in mind when you are choosing things for your room .
#Text=If you 're a child or teenager , have your parents change your carpet and walls if you want them changed , and be sure to ask permission before hanging up artwork .
